title: What is the number of shares traded on the London Stock Exchange each day? - Quora

response.answer_text: The average daily trades in December 2016 are as follows: UK order book: 949,728Italian order book: 343,420Derivatives - Equity & Commodity: 283,162Derivatives - Interest Rate: 6,204Retail Bonds: 14,491MTS Cash: 1,728MTS Repo: 3,925EuroTLX: 8,662Turquoise Integrated: 814,835Turquoise PlatoTM: 55,287Source: http://www.londonstockexchange.com/statistics/monthly-market-report/dec-16.pdf
As on 30th Dec 2016, Currently, 2,267 shares are traded on London Stock Exchange each day. You can find the complete list at this link
